abstract: Kim Myong-Gil (Hanja: 金明吉,Korean: 김명길, born 16 October 1984) is a North Korean international football player. He plays for Amrokgang in the DPR Korea League.He has played on ten occasions for the North Korean national team, and has been called up to their 23-man squad for the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
